name: collab shmup
description:
A Studio Ghibli inspired cozy shmup game 🌱 

⭐Controls: 

  1. Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move the player around
  2. Use the spacebar to shoot bullets

✨Rules:

     ⚠️ Beat all three levels to win the game!

     ❗ If you run out of lives before you complete all three levels, it’s game over!

  • Level 1
    • Score 100 points slow moving enemies are attacking horizontally
    • Lose 1 life point you get hit by an enemy
  • Level 2
    • Score 100 points while enemies move faster vertically and horizontally
    • You can’t kill No Face so don’t waste time trying to kill it! Avoid the enemy!
    • Score decreases by 10 if calcifer makes it across the screen
  • Level 3
    • Defeat the Boss to win! Not only do enemies move faster, but the boss has the ability to shoot bullets
    • Score decreases by 15 if calcifer makes it across the screen
    • Like level 2, you can’t kill No Face so avoid the enemy!

Credit:

🌸Sprites: All sprites were created and designed by us

🔊Sound:  All sound effects and background music were found on chosic.com and jfxr.frozenfractal.com
